title: Bug 130068 [Regression] Report Parameter window doesn't pop up when preview a report with parameter.
description: Report Parameter window doesn't pop up when preview a report with parameter.
OB: When attempting to preview a report that includes a parameter, the Report Parameter window does not appear as expected.
EB: The expected behavior is that when previewing a report with a parameter, the Report Parameter window should pop up, allowing the user to input the parameter value.
SR: Steps to reproduce: 1. Create a new report parameter without setting a default value. 2. Drag the parameter to the report layout. 3. Attempt to preview the report.
